author: quinlan
msg: Bugzilla #284: check date for RFC 822 compliance (more or less)

author: quinlan
msg: use Getopt::Long and add some comments about options
add --mh option for mh-style maildirs that are missing $folder/1
add --all option to not skip large messages
removed old comments about the size checks

author: matt_sergeant
msg: Fixed the +2 font rule that fails on <font size=3D2>, which is seen in a lot of MSWord emails
